languages.text: {n}Вы не до конца понимаете, как флейтист управляет грызуном, но старые добрые грязные приемчики никогда не подводят. Ваша нога невзначай касается основания ящика, и игральная доска чуть кренится. А крыса, соблазненная кусочком галеты из сухпайка, незаметно зажатым между вашими пальцами, с радостью катит шарик в нужную сторону.{/n}

{n}You are not entirely certain how the flute player controls his rat, but you still have your bag of old and reliable tricks at your disposal. Your foot touches the base of the crate stack seemingly by accident, and the board tilts slightly. Meanwhile, the rat, tempted by the piece of hardtack clutched surreptitiously between your fingers, happily rolls the ball right where you want it to go.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы не до конца понимаете, как флейтист управляет грызуном, но старые добрые грязные приемчики никогда не подводят. Ваша нога невзначай касается основания ящика, и игральная доска чуть кренится. А крыса, соблазненная кусочком галеты из сухпайка, незаметно зажатым между вашими пальцами, с радостью катит шарик в нужную сторону.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez beau ignorer comment le joueur de flûte contrôle son rat, vous avez vous-même plus d'un tour dans votre sac. Vous donnez « par inadvertance » un coup de pied dans la pile de caisses, ce qui fait légèrement pencher le plateau. Pendant ce temps, le rat, attiré par le morceau de biscuit sec subrepticement glissé entre vos doigts, fait joyeusement rouler la bille exactement là où vous voulez qu'elle aille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are not entirely certain how the flute player controls his rat, but you still have your bag of old and reliable tricks at your disposal. Your foot touches the base of the crate stack seemingly by accident, and the board tilts slightly. Meanwhile, the rat, tempted by the piece of hardtack clutched surreptitiously between your fingers, happily rolls the ball right where you want it to go.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez beau ignorer comment le joueur de flûte contrôle son rat, vous avez vous-même plus d'un tour dans votre sac. Vous donnez « par inadvertance » un coup de pied dans la pile de caisses, ce qui fait légèrement pencher le plateau. Pendant ce temps, le rat, attiré par le morceau de biscuit sec subrepticement glissé entre vos doigts, fait joyeusement rouler la bille exactement là où vous voulez qu'elle aille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No tienes muy claro cómo hace el flautista para controlar a la rata, pero todavía dispones de tu viejo y fiable repertorio de trucos. Tu pie toca la base del montón de cajas como por accidente, y el tablero se ladea un poco. Al mismo tiempo la rata, atraída por un trozo de galleta que ocultas discretamente entre tus dedos, hace rodar la bola hasta donde tú quieres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are not entirely certain how the flute player controls his rat, but you still have your bag of old and reliable tricks at your disposal. languages.text: {n}フルート吹きがどうやってネズミを操作しているかはハッキリと分からないが、こちらには昔ながらの確かな技がある。こちらの足がうっかり木箱の底に触れて、遊戯盤がわずかに傾いた。一方で、ネズミはこちらの指の間にこっそり挟んだ堅パンに誘われて、望んだところにホイホイとボールを転がしてくれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are not entirely certain how the flute player controls his rat, but you still have your bag of old and reliable tricks at your disposal. Your foot touches the base of the crate stack seemingly by accident, and the board tilts slightly. Meanwhile, the rat, tempted by the piece of hardtack clutched surreptitiously between your fingers, happily rolls the ball right where you want it to go.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フルート吹きがどうやってネズミを操作しているかはハッキリと分からないが、こちらには昔ながらの確かな技がある。こちらの足がうっかり木箱の底に触れて、遊戯盤がわずかに傾いた。一方で、ネズミはこちらの指の間にこっそり挟んだ堅パンに誘われて、望んだところにホイホイとボールを転がしてくれる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你并不完全确定吹笛人是如何控制老鼠的，但你了解许多古老而可靠的技巧。你的脚似乎无意间碰到了箱子底部，箱子也微微倾斜了些。与此同时，你靠着藏在指间的硬糖引诱着吹笛人的老鼠，让它开开心心地将球滚到了你希望的地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are not entirely certain how the flute player controls his rat, but you still have your bag of old and reliable tricks at your disposal. Your foot touches the base of the crate stack seemingly by accident, and the board tilts slightly. Meanwhile, the rat, tempted by the piece of hardtack clutched surreptitiously between your fingers, happily rolls the ball right where you want it to go.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你并不完全确定吹笛人是如何控制老鼠的，但你了解许多古老而可靠的技巧。你的脚似乎无意间碰到了箱子底部，箱子也微微倾斜了些。与此同时，你靠着藏在指间的硬糖引诱着吹笛人的老鼠，让它开开心心地将球滚到了你希望的地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist nicht ganz sicher, wie der Flötenspieler seine Ratte steuert, aber du kennst eine Menge alte und verlässliche Tricks für Situationen wie diese. Dein Fuß berührt wie zufällig die Basis des Kistenstapels, und das Brett neigt sich leicht. Mittlerweile wird die Ratte von dem Schiffszwieback angelockt, den du heimlich zwischen den Fingern hältst, und rollt die Kugel freudig genau dahin, wo du sie haben willst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Flütçünün sıçanı nasıl kontrol ettiğini tam olarak çözemesen de kullanabileceğin daha bir dünya eski ve güvenilir numaran var. Ayağın, kaza eseri gibi görünerek kasa yığınının tabanına değiyor ve tahta hafifçe eğiliyor. Bu esnada parmaklarının arasındaki gizlice tuttuğun kraker parçasıyla aklı çelinen sıçan, topu istediğin yere mutlulukla yuvarlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are not entirely certain how the flute player controls his rat, but you still have your bag of old and reliable tricks at your disposal.
